# Avali
Adapted to live in cold envinronments, their bodies are capable of handling extremely cold temperatures. Their temperature range is [color=#12ABE8] approximately -50C to 36C[/color]. Additionally, due to their traditionally smaller stature [color=#ffa500] they are 5% less dense than the average species[/color] meaning they are slightly more susceptible to being shoved over and its more difficult for them to pull objects.
